In addition, although a March 2012 
census of the four SMGL-supported 
districts identified maternal deaths during 
the baseline period, an endline census 
did not occur. As a result, Zambia only 
monitored maternal deaths that occurred 
in health facilities. (See the Maternal 
Mortality report for more detail.)
